LanguageData.EOTR_CaravanSite_LetterText: While travelling, your caravan spotted a site: {0}.\nWould you like to approach the site now or mark it for later?
LanguageData.EOTR_TransporterSite_LetterText: While flying to their destination, {0} spotted the ruins of a hidden site below. The structures still stand in surprisingly good condition, as though waiting to be uncovered. \n{0} marked the location for later exploration.
LanguageData.EOTR_Site: On their route, {0}â€™s caravan stumbled upon the ruins of a hidden site and marked them. The buildings stand tall, scarred by time but far from collapsed. \nThere could be valuables inside, however Such ruins rarely remain untouched without reason
